data: Dr. Sayan Chandra Dr. Sayan Chandra PhD (Applied Physics) - University of South Florida, Tampa, USA MS (Physics) - Indian Institute of Technology Madras, Chennai, India BS (Physics) - University of Calcutta, Kolkata, India Research Interests Optoelectronics - Infrared detection, solar cells, thermoelectricity Nanofabrication, Thin film growth and nanostructure synthesis, Advanced microscopic techniques Materials Science - Semiconductors, Multiferroics, 2D materials Optical sensors for biomolecule detection and gas sensing Electromagnetic simulations He/Him/His, Assistant Professor Physics and Astronomy Phone: (828) 262-4996 Garwood Hall 319
